title: PrimeXBT launches Black Friday offer with 77% off Bitcoin trading fees for South African traders
description: PrimeXBT, a multi-asset broker operating in South Africa under FSCA regulation, has announced a Black Friday offer giving traders 77% off trading fees on Bitcoin (BTC/USDT) Crypto Futures.
